law.catch_line: Districts may combine to acquire equipment or infrastructure.
law.text: Any two (2) or more soil and water conservation districts may combine with each other for the purpose of obtaining and using the specialized equipment or infrastructure referred to in KRS 262.610, upon the terms and conditions set forth in KRS 262.610 to 262.660.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 6, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 67. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 1.
